connect_to_logistic_network.title: Connect to logistic network?
connect_to_logistic_network.description: Whether or not this entity's function should be controlled by some condition based on the logistic network it resides inside of.

logistic_condition.title: Logistic Condition
logistic_condition.description: The logistic condition that the entity should be enabled with, if 'connect_to_logistic_network' is 'true'.
